body: Sorry for the spoiler, i couldn't resist

At the end of love live sunshine, after the saints snow kill ruby (who was in the body of chika) and dia, chika uses the power of the LOVE ARROW SHOOT to unleash the MIKAN EXPERIENCE REQUIEM, with that, the little orange puts an end to the crazyness of the saint sbow by trapping them in an infinyte death loop.
So the ones who ended up surviving where you, yosh-hane, our hero chika and hanamaru pannacota who left the gang for no apparent reason.
